alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; De Kalb; Gentry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:46AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Doniphan, northeastern Buchanan, northwestern Clinton, southwestern Gentry, Andrew and western DeKalb Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 246 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amazonia, or near Savannah, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Savannah, Wathena, Elwood, Country Club Villa, Country Club, King City, Stewartsville, Union Star, Amazonia, Clarksdale, Fillmore, Easton, Rosendale, Cosby, Rea, St. Joseph Airport and Helena. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 43 and 66. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; De Kalb; Gentry
